Unfortunately, I have reached my capacity for contract work. If you want to reach out to me for other opportunities or talk about a mentorship, please send me a direct message on LinkedIn.

References

Ryan is an incredibly driven and effective individual who will never lose sight of the UX process. I have seen Ryan act as a conduit between the development and UX teams on many projects in the past five years. His combination of knowledge, experience, education, and personality make him the ideal UX professional to interface with Engineers to help create a symbiotic relationship between two departments that have historically been disjointed across the industry.

Ryan takes a thorough and pragmatic approach to everything he does, and that is why he’s earned my implicit trust over the years. He has never made me question his ability to make the right decisions for the user and the product. His passion for the UX process transcends his work-life and absorbs much of his free time. He is committed to personal growth and furthering his knowledge of UX in every project he takes on.

Austin Kurpuis Senior Developer Bitovi
